title: Secretary Bai Wants to Resign Everyday
overview: Bai Jing works as a secretary for a very picky director Jin Shi An. Because of him, she not only constantly suffers at work, but also loses a boyfriend. Secretary Bai dreams of quitting, but one day, on Valentine's Day, he gets into a time loop and returns to this day every morning. Gradually, she gets closer to Director Jin and learns the truth about why he treated her so cruelly.
